keywords.indexterm: Installing Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on

body.note: The Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on comes pre-installed in Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author starting with version 21.0. The add-on is compatible with Oxygen XML Editor/Author version 19.0 or later.
body.p:
If you are using a version of 19.0 through 20.1, or the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-in was uninstalled, you can re-install it by following these steps:
In Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author, go to Help / Install new add-ons to open an add-on selection dialog box.
Enter or paste https://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Addons/default/updateSite.xml in the Show add-ons from field or select it from the drop-down menu.
Select Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on and click Next.
Select the I accept all terms of the end user license agreement option and click Finish.
Restart the application.
Result: The Show Content Fusion Task Manager button is now available on the toolbar. Clicking it will open the Content Fusion Task Manager view.
